predicate.note: Frames file for 'constrain' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with prevent.

roleset.name: prevent, hinder

example.name: theme and action
example.text: General Mills, meanwhile, finds itself constrained *trace* from boosting sales further because its plants are operating at capacity.
example.arg: because its plants are operating at capacity

roleset.note: Arg1 does not take -REC in this case because there is no other instance of that entity in this structure. "Find" would take a -REC tag, because that shows both "GM" and "itself".

example.name: with agent?
example.text: Mary constrained John from eating the chocolate bunny.
